sys_script_include.name: TableScripts_Utils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_40d9db938348d21067c3bfc6feaad317
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1509365_mktest.TableScripts_Utils</api_name><caller_access>1</caller_access><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>TableScripts_Utils</name><script><![CDATA[var TableScript_Utils = Class.create();
TableScript_Utils.prototype = {
    initialize: function(tableLabel, tableName, extendsto, columnjson) {
        this.Label = tableLabel;
        this.Name = tableName;
        this.Moduleneeded = false;
        this.TableExtends = extendsto;
        this.ColumnsJSON = columnjson; // comma delimited list of column names. by default, the type of column would be "string". change it as per your requirement.
    },
    createTable: function() {
        var tc = new global.GlideTableCreator(this.Name, this.Label);
        var columnattrs = this.getColumns();
        tc.setColumnAttributes(columnattrs);
        if (typeof this.TableExtends != 'undefined')
            tc.setExtends(this.TableExtends);
        tc.update();
        gs.sleep(10000); //wait for table to be updated.

    },
    getColumns: function() {
        var attrs = new Packages.java.util.HashMap();
        var arrcolumns = this.ColumnsJSON.split(',');
        for (var clm = 0; clm < arrcolumns.length; clm++) {
            var ca = new GlideColumnAttributes(arrcolumns[clm]);
            ca.setType("string");
            ca.setUsePrefix(true); // this can be changed if you don't want to add "u_" prefix to the column
            attrs.put(arrcolumns[clm], ca);
        }
        return attrs;
    },
    type: 'TableScript_Utils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-21 19:01:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>40d9db938348d21067c3bfc6feaad317</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TableScripts_Utils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="MKTest" source="x_1509365_mktest">4f166eb683ff421067c3bfc6feaad3df</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="MKTest">4f166eb683ff421067c3bfc6feaad3df</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_40d9db938348d21067c3bfc6feaad317</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-21 19:01:34</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
